mng: to smash, to pound, to fail, to muck up, to bungle

exm.mng: to smash, to pound, to fail, to muck up, to bungle
to pulverize, to smash to bits
to move a stone and stub one's toe, to shoot oneself in the foot (idiom)
exm.pyn: bān shí tou zá zì jǐ de jiǎo

exm.mng: to pound the earth to make a building foundation
to hurt oneself by one's own doing, to boomerang, to shoot oneself in the foot (idiom)
to mess (sth) up, to foul up, to spoil
to crush one's own foot while trying to maneuver a rock (to a cliff edge, to drop on one's enemy) (idiom), hoisted by one's own petard
exm.pyn: bān qǐ shí tou zá zì jǐ de jiǎo

exm.mng: to be willing to sacrifice everything one has (idiom)
